item.title: BGP & NSX-T & USG
item.description: BGP (Border Gateway Protocol) between VMware NSX-T and USG (Ubiquiti Security Gateway) Setup exterior BGP (Border Gateway Protocol) between VMware NSX-T and USG (Ubiquiti Security Gateway). When trying NSX-T most start with static routes. If we want to experiment with more advanced failure recovery modes with the edge, we need to move from static routes to a dynamic routing protocol between the upstream router and the NSX-T edge nodes. This exercise configures BGP between NSX-T and a USG.
